name: Peelon Shutdown
description:
Peelon Productions is developing machines at an astounding rate, but the machines are far too dangerous and evil. To make sure Peelon is shut down, you use multiple mechanical towers, to shoot down the metallic machines. Place down mortars, laser guns and controllable turrets to stop the rampaging robots!

Made by GiantMarble

Credit to Ecrett and Bosca Ceoil for music

WASD to move.

When you buy a tower, touch the toolbox to get the tower in your inventory!

Left click when a tower is in your inventory, to see where that tower will be placed.

Left click again to place the tower.

Right click to stop seeing where that tower will be placed.

At times, your shop will break, and you can't purchase towers!
